sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Header from '../Header/header' import './hero.css' import hero_image from '../../assets/hero_image.png'; import hero_image_back from '../../assets/hero_image_back.png'; import Heart from '../../assets/heart.png'; import Calories from '../../assets/calories.png' import NumberCounter from 'number-counter' //Framer motion Npm package import { motion } from 'framer-motion' const Hero = () => { const transition = { type: 'spring', duration: 3 } const mobile = window.innerWidth <= 768 ? true : false; return (
{/* The Best Ad */}
The Best Fitness Club in your town!
{/* The hero heading */}
Shape Your
Ideal Body
In here we will help you to shape and build your ideal body and live up your life to fullest
{/* Figures */}
expert coaches
members joined
fitness programs
{/* Hero buttons */}
Heat Rate 116 bpm {/* hero imgages */} {/* Calories */}
Calories Burned 220 kcal
) } export default Hero
